title: Un conseil d'amie
description:
Don't get mad when your sister borrows your new outfit. 
   Don't get mad when your sister doesn't pick you for her team. 
   Don't get mad when your sister forgets to give you phone messages. 
   Don't get mad -- get even! 
 Chloe and Riley Carlson ... so much to do ... so little time.
author: Megan Stine
